info.author: Quansight Labs
classifiers: Intended Audience :: Financial and Insurance Industry
info.description:
Overview
--------

The "mtypes" package provides a memory-type system suitable for use by any container, object, or 
library where the memory-layout matters or access to fast native-code implementations is needed.

Specifically it creates a new sub-class of type at the CPython layer so that every mtype is a type
but with special function pointers needed for manipulating the raw memory that the type implies.

Links
-----

* https://github.com/Quansight-Labs/
* http://mtypes.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
info.name: mtypes
info.summary: Meta-class of type that extends Python type system to create dtype-like memory-types
info.html_description:
Overview

The “mtypes” package provides a memory-type system suitable for use by any container, object, or library where the memory-layout matters or access to fast native-code implementations is needed.

Specifically it creates a new sub-class of type at the CPython layer so that every mtype is a type but with special function pointers needed for manipulating the raw memory that the type implies.

Links

  • https://github.com/Quansight-Labs/
  • http://mtypes.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
